import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import eventList from'./data/list.json';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);const[selectedYear,setSelectedYear]=useState(null);// ‚úÖ Naƒçti seznam event≈Ø z list.json
useEffect(()=>{const data=eventList;setEvents(data);// Vyber nejnovƒõj≈°√≠ rok automaticky
const years=[...new Set(data.map(event=>event.year))].sort((a,b)=>b-a);setSelectedYear(years[0]);},[]);// KONEC useEffect, ≈æ√°dn√Ω catch!
const uniqueYears=[...new Set(events.map(event=>event.year))].sort((a,b)=>b-a);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header",children:"Hello, Cycling World! \uD83D\uDEB4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"year-buttons",children:uniqueYears.map(year=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setSelectedYear(year),className:`button ${year===selectedYear?"active":""}`,children:year},year))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"events-container",children:events.filter(event=>event.year===selectedYear).map((event,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"event-card",onClick:()=>navigate(`/event/${event.file.replace('.json','')}`),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"event-name",children:event.name})," - ",event.date]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"footer",children:"\u2764\uFE0F Enjoy your ride! \u2764\uFE0F "})]});};export default Home;
